moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Forensic Imaging
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module will perform byte-for-byte imaging of remote disks and volumes
author: Wesley McGrew <wesley@mcgrewsecurity.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DEVICE
options.description: Device to image (use enum_drives for possible names)

options.name: SKIP
options.description: Skip this many blocks before beginning

options.name: COUNT
options.description: Image only this many blocks (0 - read till end)
